SalesOrderService.purpose: Manages sales orders, order tracking, customer purchases, and sales analytics. Handles the complete order lifecycle from creation to delivery including order modifications, status updates, and customer communications.

SalesOrder.description: Sales order header containing customer information, order totals, dates, and overall order status for tracking purchases and deliveries

fields.OrderID: Unique order number used to track and reference customer purchases across all systems
fields.CustomerID: Customer identifier linking orders to customer master data for account management
fields.OrderDate: Date when customer placed the order, used for processing timelines and reporting
fields.OrderStatus: Current order state - pending, confirmed, shipped, delivered, cancelled
fields.TotalAmount: Complete order value including taxes and shipping for financial reporting
fields.DeliveryDate: Planned or actual delivery date for customer expectations and logistics
